title: Rice and avocado salad with wasabi dressing

ingredients.item: 200g Waitrose LOVE Life Brown Basmati, Red Camargue & Wild Rice
1 ripe avocado, peeled and cut into cubes
1 essential Waitrose Cucumber Portion, halved lengthways, deseeded and sliced
2 tbsp Waitrose LOVE Life Mixed Seeds
1 tbsp Cooks’ Ingredients Rice Wine Mirin

instructions.step: Cook the rice for 20 minutes, according to packet instructions. Add the peas and cook for a further 3 –5 minutes or until the rice is tender. Drain, refresh in cold water and tip into a large bowl.
Add the diced avocado, radishes, cucumber, mixed seeds and goat’s cheese and toss together.

In a small bowl, whisk together the wasabi powder with 2 tsp cold water and leave for 2 minutes for the flavours to intensify. Stir in the mirin, sesame oil and seasoning then pour over the salad and mix together. Serve straightaway.
